citations.narrative:
The current animal inventory does not indicate the date the two pigs left the facility and no disposition records were
recorded documenting their transfer. Additionally, one Alpaca is no longer at the facility and there is no disposition date for
that animal. Records need to be maintained in a timely and accurate manner.
Correct by: June 10, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The current animal inventory does not indicate the date the two pigs left the facility and no disposition records were 
recorded documenting their transfer. Additionally, one Alpaca is no longer at the facility and there is no disposition date for 
that animal. Records need to be maintained in a timely and accurate manner. 
 
Correct by: June 10, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
